updates.description: The new API version provides developers with more control over Outlook's functionalities, including new endpoints for managing calendar events, emails, and contacts. It also allows for more granular control over user permissions.
updates.automation_value: With the new API, businesses can automate more tasks within Outlook, such as scheduling meetings, sending emails, and managing contacts. This can save significant time and reduce manual work.
updates.business_impact: This update can improve efficiency by automating routine tasks and reducing the chance of human error. It also provides more control over user permissions, enhancing security.

updates.description: This feature allows users to create automated workflows within Outlook, with triggers for incoming emails, calendar events, and tasks. Users can set up actions such as automatically forwarding emails, scheduling meetings, or creating tasks.
updates.automation_value: By automating routine tasks, users can save time and focus on more important work. It also reduces the chance of human error.
updates.business_impact: This feature can increase productivity by automating routine tasks, allowing users to focus on more important work. It also reduces the chance of human error, improving accuracy and reliability.

updates.description: This update enhances the integration between Outlook and Microsoft Teams. Users can now schedule Teams meetings directly from Outlook, see Teams notifications in their Outlook inbox, and share emails to Teams with a single click.
updates.automation_value: This integration saves time by eliminating the need to switch between apps. It also makes collaboration more efficient by bringing together communication and scheduling in one place.
updates.business_impact: This integration can improve collaboration and efficiency by bringing together communication and scheduling in one place. It also saves time by eliminating the need to switch between apps.

updates.description: Smart Scheduling uses AI to suggest the best times for meetings based on participants' availability and preferences. It can also automatically reschedule meetings if conflicts arise.
updates.automation_value: This feature can save users time by automating the process of finding a suitable time for meetings. It also reduces the chance of scheduling conflicts.
updates.business_impact: This feature can improve scheduling efficiency and reduce conflicts by suggesting the best times for meetings based on participants' availability and preferences. It can also save time by automating the rescheduling process.

updates.description: This feature allows users to automate task management in Outlook. Users can set up rules to automatically create, assign, and update tasks based on triggers such as incoming emails or calendar events.
updates.automation_value: Task Automation can save time and reduce manual work by automating routine task management activities. It also ensures that tasks are not overlooked or forgotten.
updates.business_impact: This feature can improve task management efficiency by automating routine activities, reducing the chance of tasks being overlooked or forgotten. It can also save time and reduce manual work.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: "Outlook API v2.0"
   - Release Date: November 2023
   - Description: The new API version provides developers with more control over Outlook's functionalities. It includes new endpoints for managing calendar events, emails, and contacts. It also allows for more granular control over user permissions.
   - Automation Value: With the new API, businesses can automate more tasks within Outlook, such as scheduling meetings, sending emails, and managing contacts. This can save significant time and reduce manual work.

2. Update Name: "Outlook Workflow Automation"
   - Release Date: March 2024
   - Description: This feature allows users to create automated workflows within Outlook. It includes triggers for incoming emails, calendar events, and tasks. Users can set up actions such as automatically forwarding emails, scheduling meetings, or creating tasks.
   - Automation Value: By automating routine tasks, users can save time and focus on more important work. It also reduces the chance of human error.

3. Update Name: "Outlook Integration with Microsoft Teams"
   - Release Date: July 2024
   - Description: This update enhances the integration between Outlook and Microsoft Teams. Users can now schedule Teams meetings directly from Outlook, see Teams notifications in their Outlook inbox, and share emails to Teams with a single click.
   - Automation Value: This integration saves time by eliminating the need to switch between apps. It also makes collaboration more efficient by bringing together communication and scheduling in one place.

4. Update Name: "Outlook Smart Scheduling"
   - Release Date: January 2025
   - Description: Smart Scheduling uses AI to suggest the best times for meetings based on participants' availability and preferences. It can also automatically reschedule meetings if conflicts arise.
   - Automation Value: This feature can save users time by automating the process of finding a suitable time for meetings. It also reduces the chance of scheduling conflicts.

5. Update Name: "Outlook Task Automation"
   - Release Date: June 2025
   - Description: This feature allows users to automate task management in Outlook. Users can set up rules to automatically create, assign, and update tasks based on triggers such as incoming emails or calendar events.
   - Automation Value: Task Automation can save time and reduce manual work by automating routine task management activities. It also ensures that tasks are not overlooked or forgotten.
